definition: to hit with a piercing blow
thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: If neither side loses a man, each is given minus one.
sentences.chinese: 如果雙方都沒有人被刺中，各減一分。

sentences.english: Thank you so much to all of you who can spear a few minutes answering this.
sentences.chinese: 非常謝謝對你們大家可能刺中幾分鐘回答這。

sentences.english: The swordsman pinked his opponent in the chest.
sentences.chinese: 那位擊劍運帶動刺中了對手的胸部。

sentences.english: A shard of ice seemed to pierce Harry's heart.
sentences.chinese: 似乎有鋒利的冰碴刺中了哈利的心。

sentences.english: The old man rammed the harpoon down onto the shark's head it.
sentences.chinese: 老人使勁投出魚叉朝鯊魚的腦袋扎往並且刺中了它。
我在它黑暗的刺中哭泣着。

sentences.english: But last week, my pride got pricked.
sentences.chinese: 但上週，我的驕傲被刺中了。

sentences.english: Then the liveried swordman 's thrown sword hit his chest with a loud clang and fell to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 跟着噹的一響，擲來的長劍刺中了他胸膛，長劍落地。

sentences.english: You're to turn around and let me hit you in the back.
sentences.chinese: 你應該轉過身去，讓我一劍刺中你的後背纔對。

sentences.english: He thrust as his opponent with his knife, but that man was too quick for him.
sentences.chinese: 他用匕首刺向敵人，可對方閃得很快，沒被刺中。

definition: to meet violent death/to get killed
thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
to penetrate/to pierce/to see clearly/to have an insight into
